Title: De Ligt rescues draw for Man Utd after Tottenham turnaround
Summary: Matthijs de Ligt salvages a 2-2 draw for Manchester United at Tottenham . Spurs looked to have secured a dramatic victory, having taken the lead in the first half . Both sides missed the chance to go second in the Premier League on Saturday .

Title: Olowu tasks Nigerians on patriotism over Trump’s alleged Christian genocide
Summary: Olowu of Kuta, HRM Oba Dr Hammeed Adekunle Makama Oyelude, CON, has urged all Nigerians to be patriotic and speak with one voice to protect the country .

Title: YOWICAN debunks false report on alleged beheading of Adamawa CAN chairman
Summary: The (YOWICAN), Adamawa State Chapter, has refuted reports circulating on social media claiming that Fulani herdsmen beheaded the current CAN Chairman of Adamawa state . In a statement signed by its Chairman, Rev. Dr. Gabriel L. Shall, YOWICAN described the viral report as false .

Title: Police inspector brutalises three children over witchcraft allegation in Bayelsa
Summary: There is rising outrage in Yenagoa, the Bayelsa State capital, over the alleged brutalisation of three children by their father, a Police Inspector in the state . The Police Inspector, John Udeh, attached to the Anti-Cultism unit of the Igbogene police, has been accused of brutalising the

Title: #AnambraDecides2025: Ukachukwu alleges vote-buying, Odumegwu-Ojukwu calls poll peaceful
Summary: The 2025 Anambra State governorship election proceeded amid contrasting narratives from candidates and observers regarding the conduct of voters . Nicholas Ukachukwu accused the ruling All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) of engaging in vote-buying . Odumegwu-Ojukwu calls poll peaceful .

Title: Anambra: I’d rather lose than buy votes, says ADC candidate Nwosu
Summary: Nwosu expressed concern over what he called ‘increasing incidence of vote trading’ He described it as a grave threat to democracy and the will of the people .

Title: Man Utd have room to ‘grow’, says Amorim after Spurs setback
Summary: Amorim: "We have so much to grow as a team because today was our day to win this game" The Portuguese says Man Utd have room to 'grow' after Spurs setback .

Title: 3 LASUSTECH students die in fatal Ikorodu crash
Summary: Three students of the Lagos State University of Science and Technology (LASUSTECH), Ikorodu, have been confirmed dead in a ghastly multiple-vehicle accident that occurred on Friday morning . The tragic incident reportedly involved a sand-laden tipper truck .

Title: INEC uploads 56% of Anambra governorship election results
Summary: INEC uploads 56% of results from Anambra State governorship election to Result Viewing Portal (IReV) INEC uploaded 56.47 per cent of the results from the election to its Result Viewer's Result Viewering Portal . The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) uploaded 56%.

Title: Djibouti president announces sixth run
Summary: Djibouti's president Ismail Omar Guelleh, in power since 1999, will run for a sixth term in next year's election . Parliament removed a constitutional barrier preventing him from running again .

Battling Boko Haram propaganda, disinformation our biggest challenge — Ex-Army spokesman
Man caught attempting to steal patient’s car at Plateau hospital
